text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/questionnaire-display-category defines the following codes:

Code Display Definition
instructions Instructions The display text provides guidance on how to populate or use a portion of the questionnaire (or the questionnaire as a whole).
security Security The display text provides guidance on how the information should be or will be handled from a security/confidentiality/access control perspective when completed
legal legal The display text indicates copyright, trademark, patent, regulations regarding completion, retention or use, or other legal text related to the item

name: QuestionnaireDisplayCategories
title: Questionnaire Display Categories
description: Codes defining the purpose of a Questionnaire item of type 'display'.

concept.definition: The display text provides guidance on how to populate or use a portion of the questionnaire (or the questionnaire as a whole).
The display text provides guidance on how the information should be or will be handled from a security/confidentiality/access control perspective when completed
The display text indicates copyright, trademark, patent, regulations regarding completion, retention or use, or other legal text related to the item
